title: Russia Brags About Airstrike That Killed 20 at Ukrainian Shopping Mall
content:
1. Russia Brags About Airstrike That Killed 20 at Ukrainian Shopping Mall  The Daily Beast
  2. Russia fired rockets at Ukraine mall containing ‘more than a thousand civilians,’ Zelenskyy says  Fox News
  3. Russian strike hits Kremenchuk shopping center with more than 1,000 civilians inside, Ukraine says  NBC News
  4. Russian airstrike hits busy shopping mall in central Ukraine, sparking fears of mass casualties  CNN
  5. Zelensky labels Russian strike on shopping mall ‘terrorist attack’  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
